name: exchange-rate-client

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . exchange-rate-client-v1.0.0-app --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=app/icon/iconWin.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Exchange Rate Client App v1.0.0
